verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:31
verses.text: And one told David, saying, Ahithophel is among the conspirators with Absalom. And David said, O Lord, I pray thee, turn the counsel of Ahithophel into foolishness.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:32
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when David was come to the top of the mount, where he worshipped God, behold, Hushai the Archite came to meet him with his coat rent, and earth upon his head:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:33
verses.text: Unto whom David said, If thou passest on with me, then thou shalt be a burden unto me:
